info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 2 weeks ago,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
I had a fantastic stay at Robin’s Airbnb. The apartment was quiet and perfect for working with a reliable 35 Mbps Wi-Fi
Shaila was incredibly responsive, fixing a shower tap issue within an hour. The great restaurant next door was a bonus
Highly recommended for travelers seeking quality accommodation and a caring host

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · May 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: A very spacious apartment, kitchen fully equipped. plenty of couches around for chilling out. Lovey living room to relax out in. Cafe next door is very handy, plenty of other cafes and restaurants nearby too. Location is great. Can go out about for morning or afternoon walks. Overall a great stay.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: It was a pleasant stay. I love the place and surrounding.
Nicely located next to some fantastic hotels and cafés. Spacious and well lit property and courteous host! Recommended

This place is located in Gulshan which is a prime area of Dhaka.
Pros-
-Located in Gulshan
-very clean
-there is a common kitchen with all the utensils
-They even had TV, Oven, Washing machine and what not
Cons-
-The room does not have an attached bathroom.The bathroom is just outside the room but you have to step out. It will be better if this is mentioned in the description just to avoid any last minute confusion.
-There was no socket in the room to charge a phone or a laptop or anything.When i pointed this out to the caretaker Alamin khan,he gave me a multiplug and then i had no issues but ofcourse this could be improved
-The bed mattress is really really hard.I got accustomed to it in a day but it would be great if this is changed.
Rest all was good and i enjoyed my stay here.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2024,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment:
I am truly honored by the hospitality of theirs.
Highly recommended!
And special thanks to Al-amin for being so helpful.
